Authors:
Gonzalo Platas, Vicente Gonzalez, Kalman Vanky, Matthias
Lutz
Title: Portalia gen. nov. (Ustilaginomycotina)
Abstract:
A new, unispecific genus, Portalia is described for
Cintractia uljanishcheviana, a smut fungus collected for the first time
in Europe (Spain), in addition to its type locality in Kazakhstan. The
place of the new genus, in relation to other smut genera, like
Cintractia, Dermatosorus, Gymnocintractia, Leucocintractia, Parvulago,
Pilocintractia and Stegocintractia is discussed and shown in a
phylogram, based on ribosomal DNA LSU sequence analyses. Detailed
description, including spore germination, obtained for the first time,
as well as illustrations are given for Portalia uljanishcheviana
